name: Parallel Worktree Workflow
description: Execute multiple independent tasks in parallel using git worktrees and background sub-agents. Achieves 3x speedup for independent work.
author: ProjectScylla
use_cases: Complete multiple independent GitHub issues simultaneously
Write tests for multiple modules in parallel
Run refactoring tasks without file conflicts
Create multiple PRs from parallel development streams
outcome: SUCCESS - 3 issues completed in parallel, 4 PRs created (including test fix), all auto-merge enabled
